verse: नौमीड्य तेऽभ्रवपुषे तडिदम्बराय वर्हावतंसपरिपिच्छलसन्मुखाय । वन्यस्रजे कमलवेत्रविषाणवेणु लक्ष्मश्रिये मृदुपदे पशुपाङ्गजाय ॥

तेऽभ्रवपुषे.अभ्रवपुषे: whose body is like a cloud

overall_meaning: I bow down to you, whose body is like a cloud with lightning in the sky, facing with a peacock feather around the neck, adorned with wildflowers, holding a lotus-bamboo flute, the embodiment of goddess Lakshmi's prosperity, with soft feet like a cow and an elephant.
